title: Riot, what is new Swain's age?
body: From the teaser he sports some pretty grey to white hair and a pretty aged voice, but these things could be more aesthetic than anything. As well, whatever the hell gave him his new powers could have done a number on his physical appearance so that may be a factor. Also, does he wear a face mask still or will it be fully visible? Finding that out may clarify things a bit.

replies.body:
How old did you estimate he was before, out of interest?

Because he looks a lot like my uncle aged ~55 in the old splash art...
Reav3 said early 40s once so we all agreed to that.
WHOA. If I look that old in 5 years' time, I'll know you guys broke me...! :-P
He looks like he's in his mid-to-late 50's, imo. No older than 70, though, unless he's been using some of LB's aging cream :)

> LB's aging cream :)

https://media.giphy.com/media/E1scqHx1kXOxO/giphy.gif?noredirect

Swain also basically runs an empire and an army of die hard warriors. I would hazard to say that he could very easily become aged due to stress or his powers twist him.

Transforming into a bird demon's got to do hell on the figure.

> [{quoted}](name=Scathlocke,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=6EA8Bt50,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2018-01-19T22:52:26.394+0000)
>
> WHOA. If I look that old in 5 years' time, I'll know you guys broke me...! :-P

Challenge accepted {{sticker:sg-syndra}}

I think new Swain is a bit older than Graves, like I would say, 45-50? 

I don't think his full white hair is related to his age. It should either be stress or magic. 

Also, I expect him to look younger than he actually is (and live longer than an average person), due to demon contract.

Current Swain is legit 60 btw.
Demon contract? wasnt he a semi-vastayan now?

> [{quoted}](name=GoldDungBeetle,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=6EA8Bt50,comment-id=000200010000,timestamp=2018-01-19T23:02:36.923+0000)
>
> Demon contract? wasnt he a semi-vastayan now?

Swain was up to no good in the Ionia-Noxus war. He's sort of semi everything now.

A leak hinted Swain's cut arm is replaced by a demon. With that I assume he is in contact with a demon.

That leak was pretty accurate btw.

Margrave, is that you?

http://theconceptartblog.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/10/gigantic_25.jpg

> [{quoted}](name=Ariel the Cruel,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=6EA8Bt50,comment-id=00020001000000010000,timestamp=2018-01-20T11:57:38.967+0000)
>
> Margrave, is that you?
> 
> http://theconceptartblog.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/10/gigantic_25.jpg

haven't touched gigantic in a while, wonder if people stopped summoning the vision monster next to your spawn or the healing monster on flank paths.

He is into all manners of shady magic it seems xD

Demon magic, general dark arts, blood magic, general arcane arts and who knows what else.

He has some kind of connection to LB who is the head of the dark mage society in noxus after all x)

**Original Art Spotlight splash:** 50-60
**Teased new updated splashart that was on the PBE:** 55-70
**Actual Live updated splashart:** 40-55

**Going by in-game voice:** A < 30 year old dude doing a bad impression of a 50+ year old, and ended up on ‘chainsmoker’

If he looks 55-ish, I am fine with it. I cross my fingers!

He looks in his 60s to me.

I think he's well past the 50s now, with hair such a stark white.

Also, is his natural hair color still (raven) black?
Always funny to see names I recognize from /r/SwainMains around here :P

I hope he bursts the wings out when he casts spells
I did say about 50-55. However, i remember my dad hah his entire head white at 45.
i say around 50
45-50 probably
I'd say he is around 55 or early 60s. I compare him to Tywin Lannister a lot since they seem very much alike in voice and ambition.

Swain's Lore:

> Swain is the diabolical grandpa.

End of lore.
